Class com.chimu.kernel.exceptions.WrappedException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----com.chimu.kernel.exceptions.WrappedException
public class WrappedException
extends Exception
implements ThrowableWrapper
A WrappedException is an exception that may have been caused by another exception, so it supports the ThrowableWrapper interface.

See Also:
RuntimeWrappedException
